{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated \$1.9M in 2021-2022 on contracts with SAMSON AND ASSOCIATES.
{{< /entity_summary >}}

{{< details summary="See original contracts and amendments" panel_body_class="vendor-names-list" >}}
- [SAMSON AND ASSOCIATES](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22SAMSON%20AND%20ASSOCIATES%22)
- [Samson and Associates](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22Samson%20and%20Associates%22)
{{< /details >}}
